name: 2021 the 3rd International Conference on Advances in Materials, Mechanical and Manufacturing
content: Publicationï¼š 1\. The registered and presented papers which is related to materials will be published into Key Engineering Materials (ISSN print 1013-9826; ISSN cd 1662-9809; ISSN web 1662-9795) , which will submit for Ei Compendex, SCOPUS, Inspec, CAS, EBSCO index, etc. 2\. The registered and presented papers which is not related to materials will be published into Applied Mechanics and Materials (ISSN print 1660-9336, ISSN cd 2297-8941, ISSN web 1662-7482) , which will submit for Inspec, Chemical Abstracts Service (CAS), Google Scholar, ProQuest, EBSCO index, etc.
